title: Clash Canceled?!
body: I don't know about the rest of you guys but my clash team was made up of irl friends, we don't really get to see each other much due to work and personal life issues. Some people were going to use clash as a way to catch up, we all shifted the a few things around to finally have something we can do together and have a laugh. Cancelling clash was probably the worst you guys could possibly do, i understand shit went wrong and that's fine but couldn't you speak with other regions about it working and try find a fault it that? Like you guys are a massive company and to just simply say "sorry you gotta wait even longer now" is an insult. I love league but this is making me hate it you really should have solved this better then just going "It's broken, We canceling" Very disappointed.
